definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: How to explain the formation and meaning of the following compounds?
sentences.chinese: 如何解释所给复合词的构成及意思？

sentences.english: Metaphor project on different levels of compound words.
sentences.chinese: 隐喻在复合词中的投射有不同层面。

sentences.english: Do not capitalize each word in so-called closed-form compound words.
sentences.chinese: 不要将所谓的紧凑格式复合词中的每个单词都大写。

sentences.english: Modern Chinese two-syllable compound words many of the quantity, uses widely.
sentences.chinese: 现代汉语双音节复合词的数量多，用途广。

sentences.english: The conveyance of causativity is an important feature of Chinese resultative V-V compound.
sentences.chinese: 表达致使是汉语动补复合词的重要特征。

sentences.english: In compounds, the two lexical morphemes can be of different word classes.
sentences.chinese: 复合词中，两个词汇语素可能是不同的词类。

sentences.english: Describing the morpheme order of bisyllabic copulative compound.
sentences.chinese: 描写双音节并列式复合词语素的组合状况。

sentences.english: Separating a compound word into two meaningful words.
sentences.chinese: 将一个复合词分成两个有意义的单词。

sentences.english: The second chapter is"side-by-side compound words of Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第二部分为“今文《尚书》并列复合词”。

sentences.english: Follow that, study classification of compound words of telescopic form.
sentences.chinese: 再接下来对兼语式复合词进行分类。

sentences.english: The third chapter is"modifier-head compound words in Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为“今文《尚书》偏正复合词”。

sentences.english: The first chapter is"composite standard definition of compound words in Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第一部分为“今文《尚书》复合词的界定标准”。

sentences.english: English loves compound words: 'washing machine' and all that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 英语多喜复合词，像是“洗衣机”啊这一类的。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is"other compound words of Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第四部分为“今文《尚书》其它结构复合词”。

sentences.english: What are the main features of the English compounds?
sentences.chinese: 英语复合词的主要特征是什么？

definition: radical of a compound word (in European language)
language component/morpheme/individual characters (making up an expression)
